title: [BUG][JAVA][Spring] Setting "additionalProperties" generates Spring endpoint with wrong RequestBody type
description:
Description

When using a model that has "additionalProperties" set to true, the generated Spring API expects a Map as request body instead of the generated model type.

The model for the request body is generated correctly (https://gist.github.com/CG-Patrick/44c7523dcca738390833bc971785ba67#file-exampleoperationrequest-java) but it is not used in the generated API (https://gist.github.com/CG-Patrick/44c7523dcca738390833bc971785ba67#file-myendpointapi-java).

openapi-generator version

7.0.0 (latest master)

OpenAPI declaration file content or url

https://gist.github.com/CG-Patrick/44c7523dcca738390833bc971785ba67#file-example-api-yml

Generation Details

Generated using the latest master CLI with no special config.

Steps to reproduce

java -jar openapi-generator-cli-7.0.0-20230810.025436-258.jar generate -i example-api.yml -g spring

Related issues/PRs

#1466
